gurmukhi: ros Gno nlkUbr kY su iPrXo lrby khu bIr bulwey ] sOhyN kubyr BXo Dn lY sr j`C ijqy iml kY pun Awey ]
transliteration: Ros Ghano Nalkoobar Kai Su Phiryo Larbe Kauh Beer Bulaae|| Saounhen Kouber Dhayo Dhan Lai Sar Jachchh Jite Mil Kai Poun Aae||
translation: Then, in his fury, Nalkoober called his warriors for fighting; Kuber also stood there keeping his wealth in safety; all the Yakshas then came collectively;

gurmukhi: mwr hI mwr pukwr prY sB hI kr mY Ais lY cmkwey ] mwnhu sRI KVgyS ky aUpr dMf lIey jm ky gn Dwey ]1494]
transliteration: Maar Himaar Poukaar Darai Sabh Hikar Mai As(i) Chamkaae|| Maanoh Srikhadgesh Ke Oupar Dand Leee Jam Ke Gad Dhaae||1494||
translation: Shouting “kill, kill” they gleamed their swords and it seemed that the ganas of Yama and attacked Kharag Singh, carrying their staff of death.1494.

gurmukhi: jb kubyr ko sB dlu AwXo ] qb niRp mn mY kop bFwXo ] inj kr mY Dn bwn sMBwirXo ] Agnq dl iek pl mY mwirXo ]1495]
transliteration: Jab Kouber Ko Sabh Dla(u) Aayo|| Tab Nrip Man Mai Kop Badhaayo|| Nij Kar Mai Dhan Baan Sanbhaariyo|| Agadat Dal Ik Pal Mai Maariyo||1495||
translation: When the whole army of Kuber came, the anger increased in the mind of the king; he held up the bow and arrows in his hands and killed innumerable soldiers in an instant.1495.

gurmukhi: j`C sYn blbMf niRp jm pur deI pTwie ] nlkUbr Gwiel kIE Aiq jIX kop bFwie ]1496]
transliteration: Jachchh Sain Balband Nrip Jam Pur Daipathaaa|| Nalkoobar Ghaail Keeo At(i) Jeeya Kop Badhaae||1496||
translation: The mighty army of the Yakshas was dispatched to the abode of Yama by the king and getting enraged, wounded Nalkoober.1496.

gurmukhi: qb kubyr ky aur ivKY mwirXo qICn bwn ] lwgq sr ky stikE CUt gXo sB mwn ]1497]
transliteration: Tab Kouber Ke Ur Vikhai Maariyo Teechhan Baan|| Laagad Sar Ke Satkio Chhodht Gado Sabh Maan||1497||
translation: Then the king inflicted a sharp arrow in the chest of Kuber, which made him run away and all his pride was shattered.1497.

gurmukhi: sYnw sihq sBY Bj gXo ] TwFo n ko rn BIqr BXo ] mn kubyr Aiq qRws bFwXo ] ju`D krn icq bhur n BwXo ]1498]
transliteration: Sinaa Sahit Sabhai Bhaj Gado|| Thaadho Na Ko Ran Bheetar Bhayo|| Man Kouber At(i) Traas Badhaayo|| Juddh Karan Chit Bahur Na Bhaayo||1498||
translation: All of them ran away alongwith the army and none of them kept standing there; Kuber was extremely frightened in his mind and his desire to fight again ended.1498.

gurmukhi: Bwj j`C sB gey qbih hir mhw bl ] rudRwAsqR dIXo Cwf su kMpXo ql ibql ]
transliteration: Bhaaj Jchchh Sabh Gad Tabah(i) Har(i) Mahaa Bal|| Rudraa-astra Deeyo Chhaad Su Kaanpyo Tal Bital||
translation: When all the Yakshas had run away, then the mighty Krishna discharged Rudrastra (the arm in relation to Rudra), which made the earth and the nether-world tremble;

gurmukhi: qb iSv jU auT Dwey sUl sMBwr kY ] ho ikau hir ismrXo hmY iehY jIA Dwr kY ]1499]
transliteration: Tab Shiv Joo Dhaae Sool Sanbhaar Kai|| Ho Ko Har(i) Simryo Hamai Ihai Jeea Dhaar Kai||1499||
translation: Then Shiva holding his trident got up and ran; he reflected how the Lord Krishna had remembered him?1499.

gurmukhi: sMg ru`dR kY ru`dR cly Bt auT qbY ] eyk rdn jU cly sMg lY dl sbY ]
transliteration: San Rudra Kai Rudra Bhat Outh Tabai|| Ek Radan Joo Chale San Lai Dal Sabai||
translation: Rudra and his other warriors started moving alongwith him; Ganesh also accompanied with all his army;
